SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT070
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Undelivered SSI Update Notification Report Request
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is used to monitor the delivery status of MT 671 Standing Settlement Instruction (SSI) Update Notification messages. The response to this message is an MT 071 SSI Update Notification Status Report, which reports undelivered MT 671 messages.
From: User To: FIN

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description:
Message input reference of the MT 670 SSI Update Notification Request for which the status of the corresponding MT 671 SSI Update Notification is requested. It consists of: a) Date of input of the MT 670 request message
b) Sending logical terminal and branch code XXX (irrespective of the branch code used in the original message)
c)Session number
d)Input sequence number
